column4: Well I'm just tickled as punch ...I had NEVER ran ubuntu more than a few minutes off a boot disk 2 years ago and today I have loaded 8.10, installed all types of software, including a flash player to make youtube functional and VLC to listen to my local sports talk radio station 600+ miles away from home, xchat (of course) and finally got Compiz-Fusion running with spinning cube desktops and burning windows to top the day off. All i
n all I've had one heck of a 1st day on ubuntu!!!
hows that for a 1st day story?
